channel.title: Ideas for feedback manipulation?
channel.description:
Hi! I have a show tonight where I'll be playing cello and axoloti. Running the cello through a mic into it.
i have some stuff prepared but would like to add a couple more ideas in the patch, specifically to do with microphone feedback manipulation. Haven't really messed around with that before in axoloti and was wondering if anyone had some ideas.

item.title: Ideas for feedback manipulation?
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

the most obvious thing for feedback is a filter (or eq) in the feedback path, make that adjustable and you can get different feedback ranges (low mid high) add distortion etc. to get different feedback flavours...

Read full topic
